categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, an individual flew under the callsign Blade One four years after the Battle of Yavin. A member of Blade Squadron, a starfighter squadron composed of A/SF-01 B-wing starfighters, Blade One flew as Wing Commander Adon Fox's wingman during the Battle of Endor. The pilot was later killed by a TIE interceptor.
